imageCallout.title: The Christmas Tree
imageCallout.description: It's more than a tree. It's a symbol of the spirit of the city and the people who create its traditions.

image.alt: Tubachristmas music concert under the Rockefeller Center Christmas Tree in NYC.
Outdoor nightime ice skating under the lights of the Christmas Tree and Prometheus statue in NYC.

fullCard.title: Christmas in Rockefeller Center
fullCard.description: Celebrate the Christmas season in New York by spending a day at Rockefeller Center. With incredible shopping, dining, attractions, and events, you’ll find it’s the most festive place in town.

image.alt: Ice skating at the Rock Center rink as a NYC winter tradition.

cards.title: The Rink
cards.description: Nothing says “Holidays in New York” quite like a trip around the iconic rink underneath the Christmas Tree and the Prometheus statue.

image.alt: Shop display window showcasing unique holiday gifts at the Rockefeller Center.

cards.title: Shop & Dine
cards.description: You'll find over 100 shopping and dining options here, giving you plenty of opportunities to get into the spirit of the season while you find something for everyone on your list.

image.alt: Visitor taking in the Manhattan sklyline view with the coin-operated binoculars at TOR.

cards.title: Top of the Rock
cards.description: Get a reindeer’s-eye view of New York during the holidays with 360 degrees of the skyline and indoor and outdoor viewing decks.

image.alt: The Rockefeller Center Christmas Tree and Christmas Angles are a beloved NYC holiday tradition.

cards.title: Channel Gardens
cards.description: Sit, relax, shop, and enjoy the season, all in the company of the iconic Clarabout angels.

image.alt: The Rockettes performing at the Rockefeller Center Christmas Tree lighting ceremony.

cards.title: Christmas Spectacular Starring the Radio City Rockettes
cards.description: There’s only one––this dazzling show, featuring the world famous Rockettes, is a holiday tradition for families everywhere. And the grandeur of the newly restored Radio City Music Hall, with its Art Deco interiors, creates an atmosphere that is as festive as it is breathtaking.
